ticket.title: Wrong references in the comments of AS::Dependencies pointing to watch_modules
ticket.original-body: I've just found out on active_support/dependencies.rb that many comments were referencing watch_modules (which doesn't exists) instead of watch_namespaces (which I guess is the intended one, while studying the code)
ticket.latest-body: I've just found out on active_support/dependencies.rb that many comments were referencing watch_modules (which doesn't exists) instead of watch_namespaces (which I guess is the intended one, while studying the code)
ticket.original-body-html: I've just found out on active_support/dependencies.rb that many comments were referencing watch_modules (which doesn't exists) instead of watch_namespaces (which I guess is the intended one, while studying the code)

version.body: I've just found out on active_support/dependencies.rb that many comments were referencing watch_modules (which doesn't exists) instead of watch_namespaces (which I guess is the intended one, while studying the code)
version.body-html: I've just found out on active_support/dependencies.rb that many comments were referencing watch_modules (which doesn't exists) instead of watch_namespaces (which I guess is the intended one, while studying the code)
version.title: Wrong references in the comments of AS::Dependencies pointing to watch_modules

version.body: Here I attach a patch to make those reference point to watch_namespaces
version.body-html: Here I attach a patch to make those reference point to watch_namespaces
version.title: Wrong references in the comments of AS::Dependencies pointing to watch_modules
Wrong references in the comments of AS::Dependencies pointing to watch_modules

version.body:
Marcelo, you can make changes to the API docs and Guides your self. The repo is http://github.com/lifo/docrails it has public write access so you can make the changes there. The changes will be pulled into the Rails repo later.
Please do update this ticket so that I can close it, once you have made the changes.
version.body-html:
Marcelo, you can make changes to the API docs and Guides your self. The repo is http://github.com/lifo/docrails it has public write access so you can make the changes there. The changes will be pulled into the Rails repo later.

Please do update this ticket so that I can close it, once you have made the changes.
version.title: Wrong references in the comments of AS::Dependencies pointing to watch_modules

version.body:
You can close it now, I've just update the references on http://github.com/lifo/docrails.
Just a quick note, some of this wrong references in those comments are present within the implementation of some methods. That's why I wrote that patch for Rails itself, because I wasn't sure if this kind of comments were merged into the Rails repo...
version.body-html:
You can close it now, I've just update the references on http://github.com/lifo/docrails.

Just a quick note, some of this wrong references in those comments are present within the implementation of some methods. That's why I wrote that patch for Rails itself, because I wasn't sure if this kind of comments were merged into the Rails repo...
version.title: Wrong references in the comments of AS::Dependencies pointing to watch_modules

version.body:
Thanks! :)
And as long as you don't modify the code it's cool. :)
Commit ref: http://github.com/lifo/docrails/commit/d5ef502d2a7968957376db453177183af062a2b1
version.body-html:

And as long as you don't modify the code it's cool. :)
